title.rendered: Staff Profile: Sean Reilly, Account Manager Massachusetts

content.rendered:
Sean Reilly, Account Manager Massachusetts
Phone: (508) 907-6222
 Connect on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sean-reilly-a9506167

“Experienced Scientific Recruiter and Account Manager with a demonstrated history of working in staffing and recruiting with in the fast-paced, ever-evolving Biotech industry.

If you need assistance finding top talent or if you’re looking for a new position, please feel free to reach out to me!”

ABOUT SEAN
I work in Massachusetts on the preclinical side of things, R&D, QA, QC, Manufacturing, and Operations. I have a bachelor’s degree in communication disorders and worked in the operating room for 4 years. This gave me the opportunity to readjust how I wanted to help give back to the community. I enjoy helping build teams to combat deadly diseases. Now I have been at ClinLab over 4 years building my team.

What is the best thing about your job? Being able to create lasting relationships with clients as well as seeing recruiters careers blossom within ClinLab.

What makes you good at your job? My work ethic and determination to succeed along with my team player mentality.

What do you do for fun? Outside of work I like to ride my motorcycle, golf, snowboard, and hang out with friends.
